book.synopsis: A collection of the unique paintings of Nicholas Evans portraying the close community of the coal industry; bilingual with revealing, personal commentary by his daughter, Rhoda.
book.title_long: Symphonies in Black: The Paintings of Nicholas Evans (Irish and English Edition)
